> BigLedger Documentation - Next-Generation Blockchain Platform

- [Inventory APIs](https://wiki.bigledger.com/developers/api-reference/inventory/): Complete inventory management including items, stock levels, transfers, adjustments, and real-time ‚Ä¶
- [Purchasing APIs](https://wiki.bigledger.com/developers/api-reference/purchasing/): Purchasing APIsComplete API reference for BigLedger&rsquo;s purchasing and procurement module. ‚Ä¶
- [Reporting APIs](https://wiki.bigledger.com/developers/api-reference/reports/): Reporting APIsGenerate financial reports, analytics dashboards, and business intelligence data ‚Ä¶
- [Batch Operations API](https://wiki.bigledger.com/developers/api-reference/batch/): Batch Operations APIProcess large volumes of data efficiently with BigLedger&rsquo;s batch operation ‚Ä¶
